Class DiscussionPageViewModel

java.lang.Object
application.viewModel.DiscussionPageViewModel
public class DiscussionPageViewModel extends Object

Title: Discussion Page View Model

Description: The view model for DiscussionPageView that process data, interacts with models and send back to view The code detailed design is based on map, list, and filter

    • createOrUpdateQuestion

      public void createOrUpdateQuestion(String text, boolean newText, Question selected)
      Creates or updates a question.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the question.
      newText - Flag indicating whether this is a new question or an update.
      selected - The question to update, if applicable.

    • createOrUpdateAnswer

      public void createOrUpdateAnswer(String text, boolean newText, Question selectedQuestion, Answer selectedAnswer)
      Creates or updates a answer
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the answer.
      newText - Flag indicating whether this is a new answer or an update.
      selectedAnswer - The answer to update, if applicable.
      selected - Question The question to which the answer belongs.

    • createOrUpdateReply

      public void createOrUpdateReply(String text, boolean newText, Answer selectedAnswer, Answer selectedReply)
      Creates or updates a reply to an existing answer.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the reply.
      newText - Flag indicating whether this is a new reply or an update.
      selectedAnswer - The answer to which the reply belongs.
      selectedReply - The reply to update, if applicable.

    • initiatedGlobalSearch

      public javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Question> initiatedGlobalSearch(String searchQuery)
      Searches for questions and answers that match the search query.
      Parameters:
      searchQuery - The query text to search for.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of questions matching the search query.
